```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(rstanarm)
```

```{r}
fortune <- read_csv('data/Cleaned Data.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
train <- fortune |>
  select(revenues_m, profits_m, assets_m, employees) |>
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
fit_obj <- stan_glm(formula = revenues_m ~ profits_m + assets_m + employees,
                    data = train,
                    refresh = 0,
                    seed = 42)
```

```{r}
fit_obj
```
